dialogue_history.content:
Analyze this financial news and estimate stock price movement probabilities.
Company: Apple Inc. (AAPL)
News Headline: Epic Games Ramps Up Apple, Google Fight With Third-Party Game Titles
News Content: (Bloomberg) -- Epic Games Inc., developer of the popular Fortnite shooter title, is adding games from third parties to its new mobile marketplace, stepping up a long, costly dispute with Apple Inc. and Google over their app-store fees.

Most Read from Bloomberg

What Happened to Hanging Out on the Street? How Sanctuary Cities Are Preparing for Another Showdown With Trump Texas HOA Charged With Discrimination for Banning Section 8 Renters Billionaire Developer Caruso Slams LA Leadership Over Wildfires Hoboken PATH Station Will Close for Almost a Month on Jan. 30

The titles represent the first batch of mobile games from outside developers to appear on the Epic Games Store, the company said Thursday, and will include ones played on Google Android devices globally and Apple iOS devices in Europe. Some will be free to play.

Epic Games’ mobile store debuted in August with its own products, titles such as Fortnite and Rocket League. The company has invested more than $1 billion in its digital storefront for video games and mobile apps, founder and Chief Executive Officer Tim Sweeney said in a meeting with reporters.

“We’re spending more money than we’re making every year because we choose to invest in growth,” he said.

Sweeney has been battling in the courts and the marketplace since 2020 to shake the hold over mobile apps held by Apple and Alphabet Inc.’s Google. While the company has wrung some concessions from the technology leaders, fans still struggle to download the Epic Games Store from devices that use their software.

“Apple and Google are making this really hard,” Sweeney said. “We had a goal of 100 million installs with first-party games. We knew that would be really hard. We ended up at 30 million.”

Sweeney blames impediments thrown up by the companies, including pop-ups and other deterrents.

In 2023, a federal appeals court in California ruled mostly in favor of Apple on allegations by Epic that the iPhone maker’s app store was a monopoly. However, Apple was asked to open up its App Store to outside payment options. Epic won an antitrust case against Google.

Apple and Google collected an estimated $23 billion in 2023 from the 30% cut they take from app store sales, according to a report from Matthew Ball, CEO of the investment advisory firm Epyllion.

“The stores’ fees deprive developers of much-needed margin for reinvestment,” Ball said. “Their controls have also impeded the development of new experiences and business models that might restore growth and/or create new genres and companies.”

Sweeney, whose desktop and mobile store charges a 12% commission, calls the Apple and Google app stores “the biggest abuse of market power in modern history.”

Story Continues

So far, Epic said, none of the 100 highest-grossing mobile game developers has been willing to offer titles on the Epic Games Store because of Apple’s Core Technology Fee and other restrictions imposed by the companies.

Under Apple’s Core Technology Fee, the most popular mobile games may be subject to a download fee when a developer opts to distribute them on an alternative app store. To ease the burden, Epic will cover the cost for all titles from developers that participate in the Epic Games Store’s free games program on iOS or iPadOS devices.

“The word for spending more money than you’re making when you have a great business underneath is ‘investment,’” Sweeney said.

Next I will provide you some predictions of stock price movement probabilities and the corresponding analysis by others in the previous rounds.
Note that others' predictions may indicate that they have some other information about the stock price. A high prediction may indicate that they have some positive information about the stock, while a low prediction may indicate that they have some megative information about the stock.
Also note that there are multiple rounds of precitions, demonstrating the trend of others' beliefs.
Please take these information into consideration when prediction the stock price movement probabilities.
Previous predictions:
Round: 0
Model: openai/gpt-4o-mini, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.25, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.75, Reasoning: The news suggests that Jim Cramer believes Apple Inc. will miss upcoming earnings due to declining demand, particularly from China, and has doubts about the effectiveness of AI in boosting growth. Cramer's perspective is influential, and particularly his pessimism regarding earnings could weigh heavily on investor sentiment. This leads to a higher probability of the stock price falling rather than rising.
Model: google/gemini-2.0-flash-001, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.35, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.65, Reasoning: The article presents a mixed outlook for Apple. While it acknowledges Apple's current market capitalization leadership and strong margins, it highlights significant headwinds: performance issues in China due to regulatory obstacles regarding Apple Intelligence, and an antitrust suit in the US. The article directly contrasts Apple's relatively slower revenue and earnings growth with Nvidia's explosive growth fueled by the AI boom. Nvidia's superior gross profit margin and stronger forward-looking statements for AI infrastructure spending give a definite edge to Nvidia. Although the article acknowledges the cyclical factors Nvidia might experience, the consensus and thrust of the details seem to favor Nvidia outpacing Apple. The probability of a rise or fall for Apple's stock is further impacted because of the uncertainty in the chinese market where Apple may not be able to provide Apple Intelligence. Also, the regulatory pressures put on Apple by the US Justice department has created doubts in the minds of investors. All this points to potential downsides to Apple's stock price. However, it is worth considering the advertisement at the end of the document where there is some mention of Nvidia not being best placed for investors to buy. Overall, I feel pressure on Apple's stock over this development more than Nvidia.
Model: google/gemini-flash-1.5, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.1, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.1, Reasoning: The news focuses on Samsung's new Galaxy S25, leveraging Google AI and Qualcomm technology to compete with Apple's iPhone. While this highlights Samsung's efforts to improve its competitiveness, the impact on Apple's stock price is likely to be minimal.  The news doesn't directly threaten Apple's market position or financial performance. The article mentions Apple's iPhone 17 Air, emphasizing its own AI features and suggesting continued strength in the premium market.  Furthermore, the price action of Qualcomm (a competitor mentioned in relation to the news) shows a slight negative movement pre-market, suggesting limited market excitement surrounding this development, potentially indicating that the news is considered less impactful by the market. Therefore, the probability of a stock price change for AAPL due to this news is low, with a slightly higher probability of no significant change.
Model: deepseek/deepseek-chat-v3-0324, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.6, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.4, Reasoning: The news headline suggests that while Apple may lack innovation, this should not concern investors. This implies that the market may not react negatively to the perceived lack of innovation, as other factors (e.g., strong financials, brand loyalty, ecosystem) could outweigh this concern. Historically, Apple's stock has been resilient to criticism about innovation due to its consistent performance and revenue streams. Therefore, the probability of a price rise is slightly higher than a fall, as the news does not present a material negative impact.
Model: meta-llama/llama-4-scout, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.3, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.7, Reasoning: The news headline suggests that Apple Inc. (AAPL) and other smartphone makers, including Google, are facing pressure from India to open up their app stores. This development could potentially impact Apple's business model and revenue streams related to the Indian market. Given that India is a significant and growing market for smartphones, any regulatory changes could have substantial implications. However, the exact impact is uncertain and depends on the specifics of how these changes are implemented. Historically, regulatory pressures can lead to short-term negative stock reactions if investors perceive the changes as threatening to the company's profitability or competitive position. Therefore, there is a possibility of a negative short-term impact on Apple's stock price. However, Apple's strong market position and adaptability could mitigate long-term effects.
Model: meta-llama/llama-3.3-70b-instruct, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.55, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.2, Reasoning: The news article discusses Apple Inc. (AAPL) as one of Billionaire Dan Loeb's top stock picks, with Third Point having a $216.7 million stake in the company. The article highlights Apple's strong financial health, commitment to shareholder value, and long-term strategy for talent development and sustainability. However, it also mentions that AAPL ranks 12th on the list of Loeb's top picks, suggesting that other stocks may hold greater promise for delivering higher returns. Overall, the news is mildly positive for Apple, but not extremely bullish. Therefore, I estimate a moderate probability of the stock price rising and a low probability of the stock price falling due to this news.
Model: qwen/qwen-turbo, Prediction of stock price rising: 0.4, Prediction of stock price falling: 0.6, Reasoning: The financial news highlights a continued legal and market dispute between Apple and Epic Games regarding app-store fees. This ongoing issue may lead to a decline in user experience for users trying to access Epic Game's titles through Apple devices, potentially impacting Apple's revenue from app store. However, the news doesn't directly impact the immediate performance metrics of Apple Inc but reflects a longer-term strategic and regulatory battle.


Now give your prediction about the probability of the stock price of the relevant company rising or falling. Format your response in JSON format and include the following information as follows: 
{ 
"reasoning": "[Summarize your analysis and reasoning process here]", 
"company_name": "[Company Name indicating the name of the company]", 
"company_symbol": "[Company Symbol indicating the stock symbol of the company]", 
"news_headline": "[News Headline indicating the provided financial news headline]", 
"probability_of_stock_price_rise": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will rise due to this news], 
"probability_of_stock_price_fall": [The estimated probability (a number between 0 and 1) that the stock price will fall due to this news], 
}

{
"reasoning": "The financial news highlights a continued legal and market dispute between Apple and Epic Games regarding app-store fees. This ongoing issue may lead to a decline in user experience for users trying to access Epic Game's titles through Apple devices, potentially impacting Apple's revenue from app store. However, the news doesn't directly impact the immediate performance metrics of Apple Inc but reflects a longer-term strategic and regulatory battle. The mix of previous predictions ranges from very bullish (0.6 rise) to very bearish (0.75 fall). Considering the mixed signals and the regulatory uncertainties, the current scenario seems moderately bearish for Apple's stock.",
